description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，毕业于北京石油化工科学研究院，曾任呼和浩特石化公司总经理，第十二届全国人民代表大会内蒙古地区代表。
description.en: A political figure of the People's Republic of China, graduated from the Beijing Petrochemical Science Research Institute, served as the general manager of Hohhot Petrochemical Company, and was a delegate from the Inner Mongolia region to the 12th National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 中国辽宁省的一座城市，杜吉洲的家乡。
description.en: A city in Liaoning Province, China, the hometown of Du Jizhou.

description.zh-cn: 东亚的一个社会主义国家，通称中国。
description.en: A socialist state in East Asia, commonly known as China.

nodes.id: 第十二届全国人民代表大会

zh-cn: 第十二届全国人民代表大会

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的第十二届国家最高权力机关。
description.en: The 12th session of the highest state organ of power in the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 北京石油化工科学研究院

zh-cn: 北京石油化工科学研究院
en: Beijing Research Institute of Petrochemical Technology

description.en: The alma mater of Du Jizhou.

description.zh-cn: 杜吉洲曾担任总经理的公司。
description.en: The company where Du Jizhou served as general manager.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 杜吉洲是辽宁大连市人。
description.en: Du Jizhou is from Dalian, Liaoning.

relationships.target: 北京石油化工科学研究院

description.zh-cn: 毕业于北京石油化工科学研究院应用化学专业。
description.en: Graduated from Beijing Research Institute of Petrochemical Technology with a major in Applied Chemistry.

description.zh-cn: 杜吉洲曾任呼和浩特石化公司总经理。
description.en: Du Jizhou served as the General Manager of Hohhot Petrochemical Company.

description.zh-cn: 杜吉洲是中国共产党的党员。
description.en: Du Jizhou is a member of the Communist Party of China.

relationships.target: 第十二届全国人民代表大会

description.zh-cn: 2013年，杜吉洲被选为第十二届全国人民代表大会内蒙古地区代表。
description.en: In 2013, Du Jizhou was elected as a delegate from the Inner Mongolia region to the 12th National People's Congress.
